title: Liverpool winger Lazar Markovic joins Hull on loan for the rest of the season
text:
Liverpool winger Lazar Markovic joins Hull on loan for the rest of the season The Serbia international's year-long deal with Sporting Lisbon was ended early after mutual agreement Share Lazar Markovic has joined Hull on loan (Photo: Octavio Passos) Share Get Liverpool FC   Thank you for subscribing!   
Hull have signed Liverpool 's Lazar Markovic on loan until the end of the season after the winger's stay at Sporting Lisbon was cancelled. 
The Serbia international's year-long deal with the Portuguese club was ended early after mutual agreement between them, the player and the Reds and the Merseysiders subsequently confirmed he had immediately joined the Premier League strugglers. 
Markovic, a Â£20million signing by former Liverpool manager Brendan Rodgers in the summer of 2014, made just 11 appearances for Sporting but last played on December 7 and has featured in just one match-day squad in seven subsequent games. Read More All the latest news, gossip and done deals from the January transfer window Markovic is not in Jurgen Klopp's plans (Photo: Liverpool FC via Getty) 
He spent last season on an equally disappointing loan at Fenerbahce, which was cut short by injury, having failed to make the grade at Anfield. 
Markovic was given a chance to impress Jurgen Klopp in pre-season but the German made a decision early on the 22-year-old was not part of his plans. poll loading Has Lazar Markovic played his last game in a Liverpool shirt? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
